official_title: A bill to amend section 1861(e)(5) of the Social Security Act to extend to 1982 the waiver of the 24-hour nursing service requirement permitted for certain rural hospitals.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to extend until 1982 the waiver, permitted to certain rural hospitals, of the requirement that a hospital must have 24 hour nursing service in order to qualify as a hospital under the Medicare program.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1861(e)(5) of the Social Security Act to extend to 1982 the waiver of the 24-hour nursing service requirement permitted for certain rural hospitals.
